UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Discovery of Distinctin-Like-Peptide-PH (DLP-PH) From the Skin Secretion of Phyllomedusa hypochondrialis, a Prototype of a Novel Family of Antimicrobial Peptide.
Literature.Author: Wu D, Gao Y, Tan Y, Liu Y, Wang L, Zhou M, Xi X, Ma C, Bininda-Emonds ORP, Chen T, Shaw C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml,Horse erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Horse erythrocytes:40% Hemolysis=512 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=>512µg/ml),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MFC=64µg/ml)
